info.description: Server API for MySQL auto failover. Generally must be called by CLI
info.title: MySQL auto failover server API

get.description: Return the version of running app. Not the API version, but the application

X-Ratelimit-Reset.description: Rate limit reset interval in seconds

Response.description: Response wrapper to not build the API on top of outdated HTTP codes set

error.description: Error message. If status is not success, this field must be filled by a string with error message

status.description:
Response status
* success - everything is OK
* error   - something went wrong
* warning - something went wrong, but it's not critical

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key for the server. For now, only 'root' is allowed
ApiKeyAuth.name: X-Auth-Token
